subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Coach Pia Sundhage decided it was time to go home to her native Sweden. She will stay on for the next two games of the United States women’s soccer team’s victory tour.
snippet: Coach Pia Sundhage decided it was time to go home to her native Sweden. She will stay on for the next two games of the United States women’s soccer team’s victory tour.
